revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Kalos Power Plant |image = [[File:Kalos Power Plant.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Kalos Power Plant. |tokens = 575,000 |location = South of Route 13 }} '''Kalos Power Plant''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 7,903,570 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=9|<center> N/A || [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk, [[File:Scraggy.png|40px]] Scraggy |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat, [[File:Scraggy.png|40px]] Scraggy |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat, [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat, [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard, [[File:Scraggy.png|40px]] Scraggy, [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Swalot.png|40px]] Swalot |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard, [[File:Swalot.png|40px]] Swalot |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Houndoom.png|40px]] Houndoom |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | '''[[File:Volcanion.png|40px]] Volcanion*''' || <center> 83,945,700 || [[File:Team_Flare_Aliana.png|40px]] Team Flare Aliana || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena || <center> 75,384,400 |- |}
<!--T:7--> '''*Must be Kalos Champion and have cleared Kalos Power Plant at least 5 times to unlock Volcanion'''
